name: string theories / luz i
description:
String theory predicts that everything is made up of tiny strings resonating. Part of a series exploring the idea that we all are resonating connected strings. That everything is. A tribute to generative as a concept. Strings with different resonating modes generate space and time, and everything therein.

A generative artwork by Marcelo Soria-Rodríguez, @msoriaro.

Made with Processing, 1920x1080 looping mp4.
